questions.answer: Parking is available in Lot A and Lot B. Please display your hackathon parking pass on your dashboard.
Dinner will be served at 6:00 PM. We're having pizza and salads! Vegetarian and vegan options are available.
Dinner will be served in the Main Hall on the first floor.

Check out the full schedule at: [Insert schedule link here]

Key times:
- Check-in: 9:00 AM
- Opening ceremony: 10:00 AM
- Hacking begins: 11:00 AM
- Submissions due: 3:00 PM Sunday
- Demos: 4:00 PM Sunday
Restrooms are located on each floor near the elevators.
Need help? Look for volunteers in blue shirts or visit the Help Desk in the Main Hall. You can also post in #help-desk on this Discord!

Submit your project on Devpost: [Insert Devpost link here]
Deadline: Sunday at 3:00 PM
Prizes will be announced during the closing ceremony! Categories include Best Overall, Best Beginner Hack, Most Creative, and sponsor prizes.
Quiet rooms for sleeping are available in Rooms 201-203. Please be respectful of others resting.

default_response: I'm not sure about that. Please ask a volunteer or check the #announcements channel for more information!
welcome_message: Hey there! I'm the Gullhacks Helper Bot. Ask me questions about parking, food, schedule, wifi, and more!
